name: Kill Yourself - Demo
description:
A Retro Inspired 2D-Platformer (similar to VVVVVV, IWBTG) in which Killing yourself, makes Life just a little easier. Using your Dead bodies as Platforms increases the likeliness of Completing the level.

But how could you live with the guilt of Killing yourself?


- Fast, Challenging and Fun Gameplay.
- Up to 50 levels varying in Difficulty.

- Chiptune soundtrack

- FREE 12 Level DEMO (coming soon)

Full Game Coming soon for PC, MAC, LINUX & ANDROID!
